title: Seizure Monitor and Detector
description: A wearable EMG-based seizure detection system that captures muscle signals, processes them in real time, and alerts caregivers using signal processing techniques and embedded hardware.

title: Smart Attendance System
description: A MATLAB-based facial recognition attendance system built using the MyNet1 algorithm with IP-based contextual logging and automated Excel output storage.

title: Job Role Prediction Web Application
description: A full-stack web application that predicts suitable job roles based on academic inputs using a Python ML model, MySQL database, and Tailwind CSS for UI.

title: The Game of Great Wall
description: A Python-based game that uses BFS algorithms to compute optimal movement paths and visualize real-time shortest-path strategies.

title: Traffic Light Controller
description: A Synopsys-based digital traffic light controller designed using sequential logic and FSM concepts to simulate realistic traffic signal sequences.

title: LED Glow Using Hand Gesture
description: A gesture-controlled LED system that integrates Arduino with Python and OpenCV to detect hand movements and trigger LED responses in real time.
